title: Photograph, "View of the altar of an unidentified church", 1904–13
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: View from the right front of an altar with an arcade across the front; in the center, a lamb in relief. The reredos of another arcade behind six candlesticks; three on each side of a high spired and turreted tabernacle. The Holy Ghost shown in a painting above; a window at left.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, "View of the altar of an unidentified church", 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 1961-83-1.
